mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_tb ( user_id, order_number, total_price, payment_status, ordered_at, address, detail_address ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{orderNumber}, #{totalPrice}, 'pending', NOW(), #{address}, #{detailAddress} )

INSERT INTO order_detail_tb ( order_id, product_id, unit_price, quantity, set_id, selected_drink_id, selected_side_id ) VALUES
( #{orderId}, #{item.productId}, #{item.unitPrice}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.setId}, #{item.selectedDrinkId}, #{item.selectedSideId} )
mapper.select: SELECT od.order_detail_id, od.order_id, od.quantity, od.unit_price, o.ordered_at, i.item_name, i.size AS itemSize, GROUP_CONCAT(ing.ingredient_name ORDER BY c.display_order SEPARATOR ', ') AS ingredientsText, sm.set_name, d.ingredient_name AS drinkName, s.ingredient_name AS sideName FROM order_detail_tb od INNER JOIN order_tb o ON od.order_id = o.order_id INNER JOIN product_item_tb pi ON od.product_id = pi.product_id INNER JOIN item_tb i ON pi.item_id = i.item_id LEFT JOIN product_ingredient_tb ping ON od.product_id = ping.product_id LEFT JOIN ingredient_tb ing ON ping.ingredient_id = ing.ingredient_id LEFT JOIN category_tb c ON ing.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN set_menu_tb sm ON od.set_id = sm.set_id LEFT JOIN ingredient_tb d ON od.selected_drink_id = d.ingredient_id LEFT JOIN ingredient_tb s ON od.selected_side_id = s.ingredient_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} AND o.payment_status IN ('pending', 'paid') GROUP BY od.order_detail_id ORDER BY o.ordered_at DESC, od.order_detail_id
